Title: Mock Two Piece Beaded Evening Dress

----

Category: evening

Featured-image: CJ217-champagne-mock-two-piece-beaded-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A mock two piece evening dress is beaded and sequined with an oval cutout on the back of the bodice. The midriff of the gown is a sheer fabric giving the illusion of an open waistline with beaded trim. The long skirt is pleated and falls to the fall.
